GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of one article provided from its article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.desciption: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

comment.body: This is a bad article name
comment.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.desciption: adds a comment to an article for the given article_id, the author and body are required

newComment.article_title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
newComment.body: I am 100% sure that we're not completely sure.
newComment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.desciption: updates an article by the article_id for the votes property

updatedArticle.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop
updatedArticle.author: icellusedkars
updatedArticle.body: Call me Mitchell. Some years ago..
